lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton has released a new letter from her doctor declaring her to be "recovering well" from pneumonia and remaining "fit to serve as President of the United States." The Democratic presidential candidate faces increased scrutiny about her health after a video showed her staggering while getting into a van on Sunday. Her campaign later disclosed she had been diagnosed with pneumonia two days earlier.

headline.main: A Look at Hillary Clinton's Recent Illness
headline.print_headline: A Look at Hillary Clinton's Recent Illness
